name: Blink Dagger
notes:
Self-casting will cause you to teleport in the direction of your team's fountain.
If you used Blink to teleport to a distance over the maximum range, you'll be teleported 4/5 of the maximum range instead.
lore: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.
hint:
Active: Blink Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away. 

Blink Dagger cannot be used for 3 seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.

name: Overwhelming Blink
notes:
Self-casting will cause you to teleport in the direction of your team's fountain.
If you used Overwhelming Blink to teleport to a distance over the maximum range, you'll be teleported 4/5 of the maximum range instead.
lore: A horrifying dagger forged in the chaos maw and nigh untouchable by mortal hands.
hint:
Active: Overwhelming Blink Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away.

After teleportation, all enemies in a 800 AoE take damage equal to 100 + 50% of your strength and an additional 100% over time, and have 50% movement speed slow and 50 attack speed slow for 6 seconds. 

Overwhelming Blink cannot be used for 3 seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.

name: Swift Blink
notes:
Self-casting will cause you to teleport in the direction of your team's fountain.
If you used Swift Blink to teleport to a distance over the maximum range, you'll be teleported 4/5 of the maximum range instead.
lore: A cunning blade able to anticipate and enable its bearer's movements.
hint:
Active: Swift Blink Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away.

After teleportation, you gain 40% phased movement speed and +35 Agility for 6 seconds. 

Swift Blink cannot be used for 3 seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.

name: Arcane Blink
notes:
Self-casting will cause you to teleport in the direction of your team's fountain.
If you used Arcane Blink to teleport to a distance over the maximum range, you'll be teleported 4/5 of the maximum range instead.
lore: A revitalizing tool to help bear the weight of arcane expenditure.
hint:
Active: Arcane Blink Teleport to a target point up to 1400 units away. 

After teleportation, you restore 200 health and 100 mana.

Arcane Blink cannot be used for 3 seconds after taking damage from an enemy hero or Roshan.

name: Blades of Attack
lore: The damage of these small, concealable blades should not be underestimated.

name: Broadsword
lore: The classic weapon of choice for knights, this blade is sturdy and reliable for slaying enemies.

name: Chainmail
lore: A medium weave of metal chains.

name: Claymore
lore: A sword that can cut through armor, it's a commonly chosen first weapon for budding swordsmen.

name: Helm of Iron Will
lore: The helmet of a legendary warrior who fell in battle.

name: Javelin
lore: A rather typical spear that can sometimes pierce through an enemy's armor when used to attack.
hint: Passive: Pierce Grants each attack a 30% chance to pierce through evasion and deal 70 bonus magical damage.

name: Mithril Hammer
lore: A hammer forged of pure mithril.

name: Platemail
lore: Thick metal plates that protect the entire upper body. Avoid dropping on feet.

name: Quarterstaff
lore: A basic staff that allows you to strike quickly.

name: Quelling Blade
notes: Effects of multiple quelling blades do not stack.
lore: The axe of a fallen gnome, it allows you to effectively maneuver the forest.
hint:
Active: Chop Tree Destroy a target tree. 

Cast Range: 350Passive: Quell  Increases attack damage against non-hero units by 8 for melee heroes, and 4 for ranged.

name: Faerie Fire
lore: The ethereal flames from the ever-burning ruins of Kindertree ignite across realities.
hint: Use: Imbue Instantly restores 85 health.

name: Infused Raindrops
notes: Uses at most one charge per damage instance.
lore: Elemental protection from magical assaults.
hint:
Passive: Magical Damage Block Consumes a charge to block 120 magic damage from damage instances over 75 damage. 

Comes with 6 charges. When the charges are gone, the item disappears.

name: Wind Lace
lore: Hasten to battle on wind-touched heels.
hint: Bonuses from multiple Wind Laces do not stack.

name: Ring of Protection
lore: A glimmering ring that defends its bearer.

name: Stout Shield
notes: Multiple sources of damage block do not stack.
lore: One man's wine barrel bottom is another man's shield.
hint: Passive: Damage Block Grants a 50% chance to block 20 damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and 8 damage on ranged.

name: Moon Shard
lore: Said to be a tear from the lunar goddess Selemene.
hint: Use: Consume Consume the Moon Shard to permanently gain 60 attack speed and 200 bonus night vision. Max 1 use.Passive: Shade Sight Grants bonus night vision.

name: Gauntlets of Strength
lore: Studded leather gloves that add brute strength.

name: Slippers of Agility
lore: Light boots made from spider skin that tingles your senses.

name: Mantle of Intelligence
lore: A beautiful sapphire mantle worn by generations of queens.

name: Iron Branch
lore: A seemingly ordinary branch, its ironlike qualities are bestowed upon the bearer.
hint:
Use: Plant Tree Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for 20 seconds.

Range: 400

name: Belt of Strength
lore: A valued accessory for improving vitality.

name: Band of Elvenskin
lore: A tensile fabric often used for its light weight and ease of movement.

name: Robe of the Magi
lore: This robe corrupts the soul of the user, but provides wisdom in return.

name: Circlet
lore: An elegant circlet designed for human princesses.

name: Crown
lore: A stately crown created to ensure a well-meaning but ungifted heir could fend off usurpers and govern with a strong hand.

name: Ogre Axe
lore: You grow stronger just by holding it.

name: Blade of Alacrity
lore: A long blade imbued with time magic.

name: Staff of Wizardry
lore: A staff of magical powers passed down from the eldest mages.

name: Ultimate Orb
lore: A mystical orb containing the essence of life.

name: Gloves of Haste
lore: A pair of magical gloves that seems to render weapons weightless.

name: Blitz Knuckles
lore: An underground arcanist's update of a back-alley classic.

name: Morbid Mask
lore: A mask that drains the energy of those caught in its gaze.
hint: Passive: Lifesteal Heals the attacker for a percentage of attack damage dealt. Lifesteal from creeps is reduced by 40%.

name: Voodoo Mask
lore: A mask tuned to sip the arcane bindings that pass between caster and foe.
hint:
Passive: Spell Lifesteal Spell damage dealt to enemy heroes is returned to the caster as health, regardless of spell damage type. 

Lifesteal reduced against creeps.

name: Ring of Regen
lore: This ring is considered a good luck charm among the Gnomes.

name: Ring of Tarrasque
lore: An ageless ring forged with an otherwise simple blood magic amplified by the presumed source of its key component.

name: Sage's Mask
lore: A mask commonly used by mages and warlocks for various rituals.

name: Boots of Speed
lore: Fleet footwear, increasing movement.
hint: Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

name: Gem of True Sight
notes: Disabled while on a courier.
lore:
Not one thrall creature of the depths,
Nor spirit bound in drowning's keep,
Nor Maelrawn the Tentacular,
Shall rest till seas, gem comes to sleep.
hint: Active: Reveal Gives True Sight over a 300 radius revealing wards and units even in Fog of War.Passive: True Sight  Grants the ability to see invisible units and wards to any allied vision within 900 range of its carrier. Passive: Everlasting Dropped on death, and cannot be destroyed.

name: Cloak
notes: Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of spell resistance.
lore: A cloak made of a magical material that works to dispel any magic cast on it.

name: Talisman of Evasion
notes: Stacks diminishingly with other sources of Evasion.
lore: A necklace that allows you to anticipate enemy attacks.

name: Cheese
notes: Cheese is shareable.
lore: Made from the milk of a long lost Furbolg vendor, it restores the vitality of those who taste it.
hint: Use: Fondue Instantly restores 2500 health and 1500 mana.

name: Magic Stick
notes:
Gains charges for spells cast by visible enemies in 1200 range.
Certain abilities and item abilities will not add charges.
lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.
hint:
Active: Energy Charge Instantly restores 15 health and mana per charge stored.

 Max 10 charges. Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within 1200 range uses an ability.

name: Magic Wand
notes:
Gains charges for spells cast by visible enemies in 1200 range.
Certain abilities and item abilities will not add charges.
lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.
hint:
Active: Energy Charge Instantly restores 15 health and mana per charge stored. 

Max 20 charges. Gains a charge whenever a visible enemy within 1200 range uses an ability.

name: Ghost Scepter
notes:
Ends if you become Spell Immune, and will have no effect if you are already Spell Immune.
Shares cooldown with Ethereal Blade.
lore: Imbues the wielder with a ghostly presence, allowing them to evade physical damage.
hint: Active: Ghost Form You enter ghost form for 4 seconds, becoming immune to physical damage, but are unable to attack and -40% more vulnerable to magic damage.

name: Clarity
lore: Clear water that enhances the ability to meditate.
hint:
Use: Replenish Grants 6 mana regeneration to the target for 25 seconds.

If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

Range: 250

name: Enchanted Mango
notes: Hold Control to use on a nearby allied hero.
lore: The bittersweet flavors of Jidi Isle are irresistible to amphibians.
hint:
Use: Eat Mango Instantly restores 100 mana.

Range: 400

name: Healing Lotus
notes: Hold Control to use on a nearby allied hero.
hint:
Use: Eat Lotus Instantly restores 125 health and mana.

Range: 400

name: Great Healing Lotus
notes: Hold Control to use on a nearby allied hero.
hint:
Use: Eat Lotus Instantly restores 400 health and mana.

Range: 400

name: Greater Healing Lotus
notes: Hold Control to use on a nearby allied hero.
hint:
Use: Eat Lotus Instantly restores 900 health and mana.

Range: 400

name: Blood Grenade
hint: Use: Throw Grenade Throw a grenade at the target area. Enemies in the area will take 50 damage on impact, and be slowed by -15% and take 15 damage every 1s for 5 seconds. Radius 300.

name: Block of Cheese
lore: First there was the Belt of Strength. Then there were the Boots of Travel. Now, at long last, the Block of Cheese.
hint: Use: Scrumptious Try me!

name: Healing Salve
lore: A magical salve that can quickly mend even the deepest of wounds.
hint:
Use: Salve Grants 30 health regeneration to the target for 13 seconds.

If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

Heals for half the amount when cast on an ally.

Range: 250

name: Dust of Appearance
notes: Places a debuff on enemy units in the area that reveals them when they are invisible.
lore: One may hide visage, but never volume.
hint:
Use: Reveal For 12 seconds, creates an area that reveals and slows invisible heroes by -20% in a 1050 radius where the caster was standing. Invisible units revealed by dust take 25 damage.

 The debuff effect on enemies lingers for 8s after leaving the area of effect.

name: Bottle
notes:
Bottle is shareable. Stored runes cannot be shared.
Using a stored Bounty or Water rune fully refills the bottle if the bottle was full when the rune was stored; otherwise, it refills two charges.
lore: An old bottle that survived the ages, the contents placed inside become enchanted.
hint:
Active: Regenerate Consumes a charge to restore 110 health and 60 mana over 2.7 seconds. If the hero is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

The Bottle automatically refills at the fountain.

Hold Control to use on an allied hero.

Range: 350Passive: Store Rune Runes can be stored in the Bottle for later use by right-clicking them. Unused runes will automatically activate after 90 seconds.

Using a stored rune fully refills the Bottle.

name: Observer Ward
lore: A form of half-sentient plant, often cultivated by apprentice wizards.
hint:
Use: Plant Plants an Observer Ward, an invisible watcher that gives ground vision in a 1600 radius to your team. Lasts 6 minutes.

Hold Control to give one Observer Ward to an allied hero.

Range: 500

name: Sentry Ward
lore: A form of plant originally grown in the garden of a fearful king.
hint:
Use: Plant Plants a Sentry Ward, an invisible watcher that grants True Sight, the ability to see invisible enemy units and wards, to any existing allied vision within a 1000 radius.
Lasts 7 minutes.

Does not grant ground vision.
Hold Control to give one Sentry Ward to an allied hero. Range: 500

name: Observer and Sentry Wards
notes: Hold Control to give one ward to an allied hero.
lore: Advancements in stacking efficiency have made wards easier to carry than ever.
hint:
Use: Plant Plant the currently active ward.  Double-Click to switch the currently active ward.

Range: 500

name: Tango
lore: Forage to survive on the battlefield.
hint:
Use: Devour Consumes a target tree to gain 7 health regeneration for 16 seconds. Consuming an Ironwood Tree doubles the heal amount.

Comes with 3 charges.  Can be used on an allied hero to give them one Tango.

Tree Range: 165

name: Tango (Shared)
lore: Om nom nom.
hint:
Use: Devour Consumes a target tree to gain 7 health regeneration for 16 seconds. Consuming an Ironwood Tree doubles the heal amount.

Tree Range: 165

name: Animal Courier
lore: Losing the courier is punishable by death.
hint: Use: Deploy Courier Deploys a creature to carry items to and from your team's base.

name: Flying Courier
lore: The faithful mount upon which soar the fortunes of battle.
hint:
Use: Upgrade Courier Upgrades your team's Animal Courier to a Flying Courier, granting it swift, unobstructed movement to carry items to and from your team's base. 

Requires a deployed Animal Courier.

name: Town Portal Scroll
notes:
If multiple heroes teleport to the same location in succession, the channeling time will be increased for each successive hero.
Teleport can be prevented or canceled by Root abilities.
lore: What a hero truly needs.
hint:
Use: Teleport After channeling for 3 seconds, teleports you to a target friendly building. 

Double-click to teleport to your team's base fountain.

name: Boots of Travel
lore: Winged boots that grant omnipresence.
hint: Upgrade: Town Portal Scroll Upgrades your Town Portal Scroll, allowing it to target units, reduces cooldown and does not consume a charge on usage. Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

name: Boots of Travel 2
lore: Winged boots that grant omnipresence.
hint: Upgrade: Town Portal Scroll Upgrades your Town Portal Scroll, allowing it to target units and heroes, reduces cooldown, channel time and does not consume a charge on usage. Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

name: Phase Boots
lore: Boots that allow the wearer to travel between the ether.
hint: Active: Phase Gives 20% increased movement speed on melee heroes, and 10% on ranged heroes, and lets you move through units and turn more quickly for 3 seconds.Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

name: Demon Edge
lore: One of the oldest weapons forged by the Demon-Smith Abzidian, it killed its maker when he tested its edge.

name: Eaglesong
lore: Capturing the majestic call of an eagle, this mystical horn brings limitless dexterity to those who hear it.

name: Reaver
lore: A massive axe capable of tearing whole mountains down.

name: Sacred Relic
lore: An ancient weapon that often turns the tides of war.

name: Hyperstone
lore: A mystical, carved stone that boosts the fervor of the holder.

name: Ring of Health
lore: A shiny ring found beneath a fat halfling's corpse.

name: Void Stone
lore: Jewelry that was once used to channel nether realm magic, this ring pulses with energy.

name: Mystic Staff
lore: Enigmatic staff made of only the most expensive crystals.

name: Energy Booster
lore: This lapis gemstone is commonly added to the collection of wizards seeking to improve their presence in combat.

name: Point Booster
lore: A perfectly formed amethyst that nourishes body and mind when held.

name: Vitality Booster
lore: A ruby gemstone that has been passed down through generations of warrior kin.

name: Fluffy Hat
lore: Fine and functional foppery for the fashion-forward fighter.

name: Power Treads
notes: Power Treads can be built using a Belt of Strength, Band of Elvenskin, or a Robe of the Magi.
lore: A pair of tough-skinned boots that change to meet the demands of the wearer.
hint: Active: Switch Attribute Switches between +10 Strength, +10 Agility, or +10 Intelligence.Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

name: Samurai Tabi
hint: Active: Switch Attribute Switches between an additional +24 Strength , +24 Agility , or +24 Intelligence , and provides the bonuses corresponding with that parameter.  Intelligence Once fully charged, deals 125 to 2 random targets in 700 range every 4 seconds.  Strength  Once fully charged an attack has a 20% chance to deal 80 bonus damage and root the target for 1 seconds. 4s Cooldown.  Agility   Once fully charged, when attacked, the hero has a 20 to counter-attack a target within their attack range. 4s Cooldown.

name: Hermes Sandals
hint: Active: Greater Phase When activated, the user cannot be slowed or rooted. Gives 20% increased movement speed on melee heroes, and 10% on ranged heroes, and lets you move through units and turn more quickly for 4 seconds. Does not dispel roots that are already in place.Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

name: Witches Switch
hint: Toggle: Switch When active, Increases allied armor, health regeneration and mana regeneration. When Switched, decreases enemy armor, health regeneration and mana regeneration by the same amount.

name: Lunar Crest
hint:
Active: Glow When cast on an enemy, doubles incoming magic damage on them up to a threshhold of 375 magic damage.

Lasts 12 seconds.

name: Phylactery
hint: Passive: Empower Spell The next Unit Target spell you cast on an enemy deals a separate 150 bonus damage to the target, and slows them by 50% for 1.5s.

name: Hand of Midas
notes:
The gold given is reliable gold (you do not get the normal creep bounty).
Experience gained by using Transmute is not shared.
lore: Preserved through unknown magical means, the Hand of Midas is a weapon of greed, sacrificing animals to line the owner's pockets.
hint:
Active: Transmute Kills a non-hero target for 160 gold and 2.1x experience. When used on a neutral creep, guarantees to create a neutral item if available. 

 Cannot be used on Ancient creeps.

Range: 600

name: Oblivion Staff
lore: Deceptively hidden as an ordinary staff, it is actually very powerful, much like the Eldritch who originally possessed it.

name: Witch Blade
lore: A spiteful blade inadvertently possessed by the soul of its incautious creator.
hint: Passive: Witch Blade Causes your next attack to apply a poison for 4 seconds, slowing by 25% and dealing 0.75x your intelligence as damage every second. This attack has True Strike.

name: Perseverance
lore: A gem that grants heart to the bearer.

name: Poor Man's Shield
notes: Multiple sources of damage block do not stack.
lore: A busted old shield that seems to block more than it should.
hint:
Passive: Damage Block Gives a 100% chance to block 30 damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and 20 damage on ranged.

Has a 50% chance to block damage from creeps.

name: Satchel
hint: Increases XP that you earn by 15%.

name: Bracer
lore: The bracer is a common choice to toughen up defenses and increase longevity.
hint: Doubles its bonuses after minute 25.

name: Wraith Band
lore: A circlet with faint whispers echoing about it.
hint: Doubles its bonuses after minute 25.

name: Null Talisman
lore: A small gemstone attached to several chains.
hint: Doubles its bonuses after minute 25.

name: Mekansm
notes:
Restore does not affect units that have been affected by Restore or Guardian Greaves Mend within Mekansm's cooldown.
Multiple instances of Mekansm Aura do not stack.
lore: A glowing jewel formed out of assorted parts that somehow fit together perfectly.
hint: Active: Restore Restores 275 health to allied units in a 1200 radius.Passive: Mekansm Aura Grants 2.5 health regeneration to allied units in a 1200 radius.

name: Vladmir's Offering
lore: An eerie mask that is haunted with the malice of a fallen vampire.
hint:
Passive: Vladmir's Aura Grants 20% lifesteal, 18% bonus damage, 1.75 mana regeneration, and 3 armor to nearby allies. Lifesteal from creeps is reduced by 40%.

Radius: 1200

name: Wraith Pact
lore: A sentient amulet whose animus shakes the courage of even the strongest foes.
hint:
Active: Wraith's Reprisal Summons a movable totem in your location for 25 seconds that reduces all physical damage of enemies within 900 radius by 30% and deals 45 damage per second.

 The totem eminates the Vladmir's Aura around it. Totem can be destroyed in 4 hits. Creeps deal half damage to the totem.Passive: Vladmir's Aura Grants 24% lifesteal, 18% bonus damage, 2 mana regeneration, and 3 armor to nearby allies. Lifesteal from creeps is reduced by 50%.

Radius: 1200

name: Buckler
lore: A powerful shield that imbues the bearer with the strength of heroes past, it is capable of protecting entire armies in battle.
hint:
Passive: Buckler Aura Grants 2 armor to allied player units.

Radius: 1200

name: Ring of Basilius
lore: Ring given as a reward to the greatest mages.
hint:
Passive: Basilius Aura Grants 1 mana regeneration to allies. 

Radius: 1200

name: Holy Locket
lore: A prized relic long thought lost forever in a failed crusade.
hint:
Active: Energy Charge Target an allied unit to instantly restore 15 health and mana per charge stored. 

Automatically gains a charge every 10 seconds and whenever a visible enemy within 1200 range uses an ability.Passive: Holy Blessing Amplifies heals you provide by 30%.Passive: Regeneration Aura Grants 3 health regeneration to allies.

Radius: 1200

name: Pipe of Insight
notes:
Multiple instances of Barrier do not stack.
Stacks multiplicatively with other sources of magic resistance.
lore: A powerful artifact of mysterious origin, it creates barriers against magical forces.
hint:
Active: Barrier Gives a magic damage barrier that absorbs 450 damage to all nearby allies. Lasts 12 seconds.

Radius: 1200Passive: Insight Aura Gives allied units 2.5 health regeneration and 10% magic resistance.

Radius: 1200

name: Urn of Shadows
notes:
Empty urns gain 2 charges.
If used on a hero with Soul Release already active on them, it will refresh its duration.
lore: Contains the ashes of powerful demons.
hint:
Active: Soul Release Provides 30 health regeneration when cast on allies, and deals 25 damage per second when cast on enemies. 

Lasts 8 seconds.  

Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within 1400 units.  Only the closest Urn to the dying hero will gain a charge.

Cast Range: 750

name: Headdress
lore: Creates a soothing aura that restores allies in battle.
hint:
Passive: Regeneration Aura Grants 2 health regeneration to allies.

Radius: 1200

name: Scythe of Vyse
notes: The target will have a base movement speed of 140, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled.
lore: The most guarded relic among the cult of Vyse, it is the most coveted weapon among magi.
hint:
Active: Hex Turns a target unit into a harmless critter for 2.8 seconds. The target has a base movement speed of 140 and will be silenced, muted, and disarmed.
Instantly destroys illusions.

Range: 800

name: Orchid Malevolence
lore: A garnet rod constructed from the essence of a fire demon.
hint:
Active: Soul Burn Silences the target unit for 5 seconds. At the end of the silence, 30% of the damage received while silenced is inflicted as bonus magical damage.

Range: 900

name: Bloodthorn
lore: A reviled blade that bites deeper with each wriggle of its victim's final throes.
hint:
Active: Soul Rend Silences a target for 5 seconds. At the end of the silence, an additional 60% of all damage taken during the silence will be dealt to the target as magical damage.

All attacks on the silenced target will have True Strike.

Range: 900Passive: Mage Slayer Places a debuff when you attack enemies, causing them to do 35% less spell damage for 6 seconds.

name: Echo Sabre
lore: A deceptively swift blade imbued with resonant magic.
hint: Passive: Echo Strike Causes melee attacks to attack twice in quick succession. The double attacks apply a 100% movement slow for 0.8 seconds on each strike.

name: Eul's Scepter of Divinity
notes:
You cannot cyclone allies.
Cyclones cast on yourself go through spell immunity.
Cyclone can dispel some buffs and debuffs.
Cyclone duration is unaffected by status resistance.
lore: A mysterious scepter passed down through the ages, its disruptive winds can be used for good or evil.
hint:
Active: Cyclone Sweeps a target unit up into a cyclone, making them invulnerable for 2.5 seconds. Cyclone can only be cast on enemy units or yourself.

Enemy units take 50 magical damage upon landing.

Range: 550
Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

name: Wind Waker
notes:
Cyclone can dispel some buffs and debuffs.
When cast on yourself, the cyclone can be moved anywhere at a speed of 360.
Cyclone duration is unaffected by status resistance.
lore: Proof enough to some that unseen forces manipulate the happenings of the material plane.
hint:
Active: Cyclone Sweeps a target unit up into a cyclone, making them invulnerable for 2.5 seconds. Cyclone can be cast on yourself, enemy units or allied units.

Enemy units take 50 magical damage upon landing.

Range: 550
Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

name: Aether Lens
notes: Passive does not stack.
lore: Polished with the incantation of his final breath, the gift of a dying mage to his sickly son.
hint: Passive: Aethereal Focus Increases targeted spell and item cast range.

name: Force Staff
notes:
Self-cast will cause you to use Force on yourself.
Force Staff doesn't interrupt the target's actions.
Will not work on a unit inside Chronosphere, Duel, or Black Hole.
lore: Allows you to manipulate others, for good or evil.
hint:
Active: Force Pushes any target unit 600 units in the direction it is facing. 

Range: 550

name: Hurricane Pike
notes:
Self-cast will use Hurricane Pike on yourself.
Hurricane Pike doesn't interrupt the target's actions.
Will not work on a unit inside Chronosphere, Duel, or Black Hole.
lore: A legendary pike once held as royal sigil of the ancient wyvern riders.
hint:
Active: Hurricane Thrust Pushes you and target enemy 450 units away from each other, and for 6 seconds, allows you to make 5 attacks against the target without range restrictions and with +100 attack speed.

Can be cast on self or allies to push the target 600 units in the direction it is facing.
Enemy Range: 450Passive:  Dragon's Reach  Increases attack range of ranged heroes.

name: Dagon
notes: Instantly kills illusions.
lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.
hint:
Active: Energy Burst Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit. Heals the caster 75% of damage dealt by Dagon. Upgradable.

Damage: 400
Range: 700
Mana Cost: 120

notes: Instantly kills illusions.

name: Necronomicon
lore: Considered the ultimate in necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.
hint:
Active: Demonic Summoning Summons a Warrior and an Archer to fight for you for 60 seconds.

Warrior: Burns mana every hit, and deals magical damage to whoever kills it. Gains True Sight at level 3.
Health: 800
Damage: 25
Mana Break Damage: 30
Last Will Damage: 600

Archer: Has a passive movement and attack speed aura. Gains Purge at Level 3.
Health: 800
Damage: 37
Aura Move Speed: 5

name: River Vial: Chrome
hint: Pour this serum into the river to transform the water into liquid chrome for 900 seconds. Using this item on the river will permanently consume one charge from your Armory supply upon expiration of the effect. Charges do not get consumed if the effect is replaced by a stronger vial before expiration. Vials can only be used if at least one charge remains in your Armory. Charges will only be used by successfully enchanting the river, and will not be consumed if the item is sold, dropped, or destroyed during a game. You can only cast a vial on the river if there's not a stronger vial already in effect.

name: Super Blink Dagger
lore: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.
hint: Active: Blink Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away.

name: Keen Optic
lore: Stolen from a tinker's shop ages ago, this handy lens has seen service to many owners.

name: Grove Bow
lore: A gift from the moon goddess to one of her prized disciples many memories ago.
hint: Passive: Magic Amp Reduces magic resistance of the attacked enemy by 15%.

name: Quickening Charm
lore: An evergreen amulet of druidic origins.
hint: Passive: Cooldown Reduction Reduces the cooldown time of all spells and items.

name: Philosopher's Stone
lore: A weightless charm created by an enchanter with a powerful scorn for brute force.

name: Force Boots
lore: Elusive marvels never successfully studied for proper classification in the archives.
hint:
Active: Force Dispels the user and pushes them 750 units in the direction they are facing.

Dispel Type: Basic Dispel Passive: Speed Unlock Completely removes the speed limit for the wearer Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

name: Stygian Desolator
notes: Armor reduction works on buildings.
lore: The original demonic favorite that served as basis for the beloved mortal design.
hint: Passive: Greater Corruption Your attacks reduce the target's armor by -10 for 7 seconds.

name: Phoenix Ash
hint: Passive: Rebirth Lethal damage is prevented and instead the wearer is healed to half health and non-ultimate ability cooldowns reset. Gets consumed on trigger.

name: Seer Stone
lore: The curious creation of a wizard who professed to hail from another time.
hint: Active: Reveal Reveal a target 800 area of the map for 6 seconds.

name: Greater Mango
hint: Consume Unbelievably Good Mango Overwhelms your hero, causing you to die. However, when you respawn, you will have all talents on both sides skilled.

name: Elixir
hint:
Use: Consume Restores 500 health and 250 mana to the target over 6 seconds.

If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

Range: 250

name: Arcanist's Armor
lore: An exquisite piece commissioned by a paranoid monarch who choked on a piece of fruit long before the item saw its intended use.
hint: Active: Mega Shield Force Field Aura Grants 40% Damage Reflection for 5 seconds.Passive: Shield  Grants +5 armor and +20% Magic Resistance to all other allies within 1200 radius.

name: Blast Rig
lore: One of a set of custom rigs once worn by infamous road agents in the Outlands, its siblings have been lost to misfires and the various tides of time.
hint: Passive: Hair Trigger The next time you get attacked by a hero within 400 range, explode dealing 250 damage to all enemies within a 400 radius and causing them to miss 100% of their attacks for 2 seconds.

name: Craggy Coat
hint: Increases the wearer's armor, while reducing their attack speed.

name: Greater Faerie Fire
hint: Use: Imbue Instantly restores 250 health.

name: Timeless Relic
lore: An unmarred discovery from the excavated ruins of an ancient wizard's academy.
hint: Increases all outgoing spell damage and debuff duration.

name: Mirror Shield
lore: The shield that long ago robbed the old one of his first memories.
hint: Passive: Echo Shield Block and reflect most targeted spells back to their caster once every 12 seconds.

name: Ironwood Tree
lore: Precious. And hearty as a weed.
hint:
Use: Plant Tree Targets the ground to plant a happy little tree that lasts for 20 seconds.

Range: 800

name: Mango Tree
hint:
Use: Plant a Mango Tree Targets the ground to plant a mango tree that provides unlimited mango power. The tree generates Enchanted Mangoes every 60 seconds, and provides unobstructed vision in the area 

Range: 200

name: Royal Jelly
lore: To those who harvest olgru jelly, success serves more than mere profit--it's often the means to survival--for only the jelly itself can cure the ravages that follow a sting from the vigilant denizens of the giant hives.
hint:
Use: Consume Grants a target allied unit a permanent buff that provides +2.25 Health Regen and +1.25 Mana Regen.

Does not stack on the same unit.

name: Pupil's Gift
notes: Grants half value to each attribute for Universal Heroes
lore: An astounding plate of ever-replenishing, fortifying fruit.
hint: Increases both non-primary attributes.

name: Tome of Aghanim
hint: Use: Consume Temporarily grants an allied target the Aghanim's Scepter buff for 3 minutes.

name: Repair Kit
hint:
Use: Building Repair Targets a building, restoring 40% of it's health over 30 seconds. Also grants +10 armor during this period.

 Range: 600

name: Mind Breaker
lore: A bewitching blade of indeterminate form capable of piercing the psyche of even the most willful foe.
hint: Passive: Silence Strike The next attack silences the hit enemy for 2 seconds.

name: Third Eye
hint: Passive: True Sight Grants the ability to see invisible units and wards to any allied vision within 500 range of its carrier. Passive: Charge Loss Loses a charge on death. After all charges are lost, the item disappears.

name: Spell Prism
lore: Even the slightest flaw in the components of a spell prism can result in the death of its user.
hint: Passive: Cooldown Reduction Reduces the cooldown time of all spells and items.

name: Prince's Knife
hint: Passive: Hex Strike The next attack hexes the hit enemy into a frog for 1.5 seconds.

name: Witless Shako
hint: Increases the wearer's max health, while reducing their max mana.

name: Imp Claw
lore: Though their tasks are largely thankless, demon hunters can often turn a profit bartering parts in Weeping Rose.
hint: Passive: Critical Strike Empowers your next attack, causing it to be a critical strike dealing 130% damage.

name: Flicker
lore: The technically-true-to-his-word 'teleportation device' crafted by a notorious fae trickster.
hint:
Active: Flicker Dispells debuffs and blinks you in a random forward direction for a random distance between 200 and 600. If cast within 3 seconds of receiving player damage, it will blink in place.

Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

name: Telescope
lore: A handy tool that manages to make close what once was far.
hint: Passive: Prescient Aura Lowers Scan cooldown by 50% . Increases attack range (Ranged only) and cast range of allies in a 1200 unit radius.

name: Spider Legs
lore: A horrifying yet useful mixture of necromancy and artificing.
hint: Active: Skitter Grants you 18% bonus movement speed and free pathing for 3.5 seconds. Walking over trees causes them to be destroyed.

name: Helm of the Undying
hint: Passive: Death Delay Survive for an extra 5 seconds after receiving a killing blow.

name: Vambrace
lore: The coveted treasure that divided the heirs of Queen Raiya upon her death, resulting in the eventual downfall of her kingdom.
hint: Also provides one of the following, based on the Vambrace's main attribute: Strength: +8% Magic Resistance  Agility:  +10 Attack Speed  Intelligence:  +6% Spell Amp

name: Horizon
hint:
Active: Blink Strike Targets a unit to teleport to them. Knocks enemies back 250 distance and disables them for 1 second. 

Range: 1600

name: Fusion Rune
hint: Use: Consume Grants the target the bonuses of every Power Rune for 50 seconds. Each use consumes a charge.

name: Ocean Heart
lore: A charm blessed by the Council of the Brine.
hint: Passive: Water Regen Provides you with 10 HP regen and 5 mana regen while in the river.

name: Spark of Courage
hint: Passive: Courage Provides 18 damage when the hero is above 50% Health, and 7 armor when they are below that threshold.

name: Broom Handle
lore: The surprisingly dangerous creation of an apprentice sorcerer with a strange fondness for brooms.

name: Trusty Shovel
notes:
16% chance for a Bounty Rune.
28% chance each for a Flask, an Enchanted Mango, or a kobold.
The same Trusty Shovel cannot find the same reward twice in a row.
lore: Former plaything of a young deity, received as a gift from his uncle.
hint:
Active: Dig Channel for 1 second. 
Can find a Bounty Rune, a Flask, an Enchanted Mango, or a Kobold.

name: Nether Shawl
lore: An otherworldly garment tethered to our plane by unknown means.

name: Dragon Scale
lore: The remains of a dragon always outvalue the wealth of even the most prodigious hoard.
hint: Passive: Afterburn Causes attacks to burn the enemy, dealing 22 damage per second for 3 seconds. Affects buildings.

name: Essence Ring
lore: An ancient bauble blessed by the breath of Verodicia.
hint: Active: Life Essence Increases your current and max health by 400 for 15 seconds.

name: Clumsy Net
hint:
Active: Ensnare Ensnares the target enemy and yourself for 1.75 seconds.

 Range: 600

name: Enchanted Quiver
lore: A graceful gift blessed by the goddess of the hunt.
hint: Passive: Certain Strike Empowers your next attack with 250 bonus magical damage and True Strike. Ranged Attackers  have +350 bonus range for the attack.

name: Ninja Gear
lore: Valuable equipment recovered by a young explorer sifting through the flotsam and detritus drifting in the void.
hint: Active: Solitary Disguise Casts Smoke of Deceit on yourself only.

name: Illusionist's Cape
lore: A dashing cape whose creator insists on calling 'Cloak of Apparition' as opposed to his assistant's 'Illusion' drivel.
hint: Active: Create Illusion Creates an image under your control. Passive: Illusion Mastery Increases outgoing damage of all units and illusions controlled by the hero by 6%.

name: Havoc Hammer
hint: Active: Havoc Pulls enemies in a 400 range around you, slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds and dealing 175 + 1.5x your str as magical damage.

name: Magic Lamp
hint: Passive: Rejuvenate  When the wearer's health falls below 20%, they will receive a hard dispel and be healed for 300 health.

name: Apex
notes: Grants +25 to each attribute for Universal Heroes.
lore: Three orbs of remarkable power bound within a single scepter.

name: Ballista
lore: A simple design much improved by a master smith's loving hand.
hint: Passive: Knockback Knocks back enemies 50 distance and deals 50 pure damage with every attack.

name: Woodland Striders
hint: Active: Woodland Stride Create a path of trees behind you for 3 seconds. Trees last up to 15 seconds. Passive: Tree Walking  Removes movement speed limit and allows free pathing through trees.Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

name: Book of the Dead
lore: A record of the final reckoning. With one page torn out.
hint: Active: Greater Demonic Summoning Summon 2 sets of Level 3 Necronomicon Units that last 75 seconds. Units have 100% more health and 75% more damage.

name: Fallen Sky
lore: One of the few surviving creations of the acolytes of the Wyrmforge.
hint:
Active: Fallen Sky Transform into a meteor that strikes down at the target area after 1 seconds in a 315 AoE, stunning enemies for 1.6 seconds and dealing impact damage. Continues to deal damage every 1 seconds to enemy units and buildings for 6 seconds.

Building Impact Damage: 75 
Building Over Time Damage: 60 

Non-Building Impact Damage: 150 
Non-Building Over Time Damage: 60

 Range: 1200

name: Pirate Hat
lore: A salty skulltopper cursed with endless good fortune.
hint:
Active: Dig Channel for 1 second. 
Always finds a Bounty Rune!

name: Dimensional Doorway
hint: Active Teleport instantly anywhere on the map.

name: Ex Machina
lore: The remains of an ancient universe, preserved within a single sphere.
hint: Active: Reset Cooldowns Reset the cooldown on all items (except Refresher Orb).

name: Faded Broach
lore: A life-saving jewel bestowed upon a young queen by a kindly vizier.

name: Paladin Sword
lore: The sigil blade of the legendary Brother Yhols of Gausra, stripped from its scabbard on the day of his controversial excommunication.
hint: Passive: Greater Healing Amplifies the wearer's Regeneration, Healing, Lifesteal and Spell Lifesteal by 14%.

name: Minotaur Horn
lore: The trophy from a mighty beast ambushed and slain in the recesses of its own home.
hint: Active: Lesser Avatar Grants Spell Immunity for 2 seconds.

name: Orb of Destruction
lore: An ingot of chaos suspended in wizard's ether, housed within an arcanist's orb.
hint: Passive: Impeding Corruption Attacks reduce the target's armor and movement speed. Slow amount varies based on whether the wearer is melee or ranged.

name: The Leveller
lore: A demonic blade that struck the final blow to crack the gates of the Sanctum of Solanas.

name: Arcane Ring
lore: Once a prized heirloom of a minor lord's house.
hint:
Active: Replenish Mana Restores 75 mana to all nearby allies. 

 Radius: 1200

name: Titan Sliver
lore: Though many desire this brilliant shard for its obvious qualities, a school of study exists to determine the true size and purpose of its incomprehensible whole.

name: Chipped Vest
lore: It doesn't look like much, but it's oddly comfy.
hint: Passive Everytime you are attacked, you return 30 damage to heroes and 20 damage to creeps.

name: Wizard Glass
hint: Active Deals 125 damage to up to 2 random enemy units within 700.

name: Gloves of Travel
hint: Reduces TP cooldown by 20 seconds and causes TP scrolls to not be consumed.

name: Elven Tunic
lore: Even simple items of elven make seem imbued with inexplicable efficacy.

name: Cloak of Flames
lore: A very fine cloak that plays host to an overly-protective living flame.
hint:
Passive: Immolate Burns enemy units for 45 damage per second. Illusions deal 30 damage per second.

Radius: 375

name: Trickster Cloak
lore: A fantastic garment immediately misplaced by its creator upon completion.
hint: Active: Cloak Causes you to become invisible for 6 seconds.

name: Helm of the Gladiator
hint: Upon taking hero damage, you gains 18 damage, 5 armor, 15 for 7 seconds.

name: Possessed Mask
notes: Grants 1/3rd of the value to each attribute for Universal Heroes.
lore: Even when discarded with specific purpose and great care, this frightening mask always finds its way onto the face of a new owner.
hint: Passive: Lifesteal Heals the attacker for 7 HP on each attack.

name: Star Mace
hint: Passive: Cleave Melee heroes deal 20% of attack damage as physical damage in a cone up to 650 around the target.

name: Penta-Edged Sword
lore: The final, twisted work of a severely pious blacksmith, completed immediately before the taking of his own life.
hint: Passive: Maim Each attack has a 25% chance to reduce enemy hero movement speed by 20% and attack speed by 60 for 3 seconds.

name: Oakheart
hint:
Active: Rejuvenate Target an allied hero and restore 480 health over 12 seconds.

If the unit is attacked by an enemy hero or Roshan, the effect is lost.

name: Warhammer
hint: Active: Warhammer Deals 75 damage and reduces the target's armor by 3 for 6 seconds.

name: Bullwhip
lore: Once the favored lash of an infamous broker of pit fighters and other live trade.
hint: Active: Whip Grants 18% movement speed when cast on allies, and slows by 18% when cast on enemies. Lasts 4 seconds.

name: Psychic Headband
lore: A failed experiment in finer telekinetic control, still fit for other ends.
hint: Active: Psychic Push Pushes the target enemy unit away from you 400 distance.

name: Ceremonial Robe
lore: One of many items lost in the looting of Zelenwyr's sacred reliquary.
hint:
Passive: Ceremonial Aura Lowers enemy Status Resistance by 10% and Magic Resistance by 10%.

Radius: 1200

name: Quicksilver Amulet
lore: An enchanted talisman brimming with a mysterious substance.
hint: Passive: Quicksilver Grants you a bonus 5% movement speed and 20 attack speed anytime one of your abilities are on cooldown.

name: Book of Shadows
lore: An impossible tome filled with unreadable prose of unknowable thoughts.
hint: Active: Shadows Target an enemy, ally or self. Causes the target to become untargetable from enemies to the caster, but also silenced, muted and disarmed for 4 seconds. Applies a Basic Dispel.Dispel Type: Basic Dispel

name: Giant's Ring
lore: Prized procurement of an otherwise unremarkable ruler of Elze who abdicated his position and vanished.
hint: Passive: Giant's Foot Can path over any terrain and deals 100% of your strength per second to units you are standing ontop of.

name: Shadow of Vengeance
hint: Passive: Vengeance's Shadow Upon death, you spawn a strong-illusion that deals 100% damage and takes 150% damage. Can cast all basic spells. Illusion casts 30 seconds.

name: Stormcrafter
lore: The accidental byproduct of a spell conjured to entrap a lesser god.
hint: Passive: Bottled Lightning Zaps 2 enemy targets within 700 range, dealing 200 damage and a 40% slow for 0.4 seconds. Strikes every 3 seconds.

name: Overflowing Elixir
hint: Restores 500 health, and 200 mana over 4 seconds. Can capture runes.

name: Fairy's Trinket
lore: A small token imbued with the fortune of the fae in recognition of an intriguing display of mortal kindness.

name: Ascetic's Cap
lore: An austere hat thought to be of Turstarkuri origin.
hint: Passive: Endurance Whenever a debuff would be applied to the owner, grant 40% Status resistance and 40% Slow Resistance for 5 seconds.

name: Brigand's Blade
lore: An infamous assassin's blade stolen and smuggled out of White Spire after its owner's mysterious demise.
hint: Passive: Dark Mercy Your attacks deal 10 more damage to enemies for each 10% HP they are missing.

name: Witchbane
lore: With ready access to test subjects, untold cruelties have been dreamed up and loosed upon the world from within the walls of the Tyler Estate.
hint:
Active: Cleanse Dispel Target Enemy or Ally.

Dispel Type: Basic Dispel Passive: Subjugate Your attacks deal bonus damage equal to 4% of your target Max Mana.

name: Pig Pole
lore: A makeshift charm misplaced by a peace-loving, addlebrained enchanter.
hint: Active: Pig, Out! Turns your hero into a critter for 4 seconds and gives them +10% Movement Speed.

name: Tumbler's Toy
lore: An antique plaything found in the ruins of an Ozenja circus bazaar.
hint: Active: Vault Propels your hero forward 300 units. Tumbler's Toy gets disabled for 3 seconds if its owner receives damage from a player source.

name: Fae Grenade
lore: Those marked for death by the fae shine brightly to all manner of creatures in the shadow realm.
hint: Active: Shadow Brand Throws a Mark towards an enemy within 900 range applying a debuff that deals 40 damage every second and provides vision of the unit for 7 seconds.

name: Seeds of Serenity
lore: An evergreen sprout treasured by the woodkin and highly coveted by interlopers and their like.
hint: Active: Verdurous Dale  Target the ground with a 400 radius. Provides +10 health regeneration to all allied units while they are in the area of effect. Lasts 14 seconds.

name: Lance of Pursuit
lore: The gleaming weapon of a tarnished knight haunted by his duties to an unworthy king.
hint: Passive: Hound Attacking from behind slows enemies by 16% (8% if Ranged) and deals 15 more damage. Slow lasts 2 second(s).

name: Occult Bracelet
lore: A band that bears effigy of the dark goddess Eloshar's unsleeping eye.
hint: Passive: Rites of Eloshar Each time the wearer is attacked, they gain a stack of 0.5 mana regen, up to 5 stacks. Stacks last for 10 seconds.

name: Ogre Seal Totem
hint: Active: Ogre Seal Flop Flop forward like an ogre seal 2 times, dealing 150 damage and slowing enemies in a 275 radius by -100% for 1.5 second on each bounce. 400 bounce distance.

name: Harpoon
hint: Active: Draw Forth When targeting an enemy, fire a harpoon at them, that pulls you and the target closer together, up to 35% of the distance between you and your target. If the caster is melee, the hero and target are always pulled to within melee distance of each other.Passive: Echo Strike  Causes melee attacks to attack twice in quick succession. The double attacks apply a 100% movement slow for 1 seconds on each strike.

name: Defiant Shell
hint: Passive: Reciprocity  When attacked, the hero counter-attacks a target within their attack range. 5s Cooldown.

name: Eye of the Vizier
lore: The ring of a cunning court mage who imprisoned a cadre of enemies to serve as his personal mana reserve.

name: Specialist's Array
lore: An impressive kit of trigger enhancements born in an aging assassin's idle mind.
hint: Passive: Crackshot Ranged Only. The next attack fires projectiles that deal 20 bonus damage at 2 additional targets within attack range plus a 225 range bonus. Does not trigger attack modifiers.

name: Dagger of Ristul
lore: A sinister shiv that grants favor to those willing to stain its blade with a sacrifice of their own blood.
hint: Active: Imbrue Consume 100 health to temporarily gain 40 damage. Lasts 8 seconds.

name: Beloved Memory
lore: Take joy in remembering those beloved who've passed now beyond the veil.
hint: Active: Honor the Dead Place this Offering on an Altar to honor the dead with a memory from those they left behind.

name: Scrying Shovel
lore: You don't know where it came from, but it knows where you need to go. All you need to do is dig.
hint: Active: Dig Search the map for Offerings to the dead.

name: Forebearer's Fortune
lore: This item seems unstable. Like it might just disappear.
hint: Active: Undying Promise Signal to the spirits of the other realm your commitment to honoring them. If everyone in the battle makes an Undying Promise before the fight begins, the dead might be willing to listen.

name: Mercy & Grace
notes:
Feared enemies are phased and unslowable.
The ricochet will travel 1x Dead Shot's cast range.
lore: One to deliver the body, the other to claim the soul.
hint: Active: Dead Shot Fires a ghostly bullet at an enemy unit or tree. When the bullet strikes it will deal 300 damage and slow the target by -100% for 0.5 seconds, then ricochet in the vector-targeted direction. The ricochet will damage all units that it passes through, stopping when it hits a hero. Heroes hit by the ricochet will be feared for 2 seconds in the direction of the shot.

name: Tier 1 Token
hint: Activate to redeem a Tier 1 Neutral Item. The resulting neutral item isn't shareable and a hero can only redeem a single token per tier.

name: Tier 2 Token
hint: Activate to redeem a Tier 2 Neutral Item. The resulting neutral item isn't shareable and a hero can only redeem a single token per tier.

name: Tier 3 Token
hint: Activate to redeem a Tier 3 Neutral Item. The resulting neutral item isn't shareable and a hero can only redeem a single token per tier.

name: Tier 4 Token
hint: Activate to redeem a Tier 4 Neutral Item. The resulting neutral item isn't shareable and a hero can only redeem a single token per tier.

name: Tier 5 Token
hint: Activate to redeem a Tier 5 Neutral Item. The resulting neutral item isn't shareable and a hero can only redeem a single token per tier.

name: Vindicator's Axe
hint: Passive: Vengeance Provides 30 damage if equipped hero is Silenced and 20 armor if equipped hero is Stunned.

name: Duelist Gloves
hint: Passive: Boldness Grants 20 attack speed as long as there are enemy heroes within 1200 units.

name: Horizon's Equilibrium
hint: Passive: Equilibrium Damage dealt to and received from units further than 500 units from you is reduced by 25%.

name: Blighted Spirit
hint: Passive: Toxins Whenever an enemy attacks you, they gain -25 Heal Amplify/Lifesteal amplification for 3 seconds.

name: Dandelion Amulet
hint: Passive: Magical Damage Block Every 12s, blocks up to 300 magic damage from damage instances over 75 damage.

name: Turtle Shell
hint: Active: Turtle Silences and Disarms your hero for 15 seconds. Reduce all incoming damage by 50%. This effect is removed when your hero moves.

name: Martyr's Plate
hint: Active: Martyrdom Redirect 25% of all magic damage dealt to your allied heroes within 900 radius towards you for 10 seconds.

name: Gossamer Cape
hint: Passive: Sixth Sense Automatically dodge an attack from an enemy hero.

name: Diffusal Blade
notes: Does not stack with other manabreak abilities.
lore: An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.
